section.title: Health/Mana Chart
section.para: This tab displays a chart of your character's health, mana and target's health over time. The main idea of this chart is to help you gauge your character's overall efficienty and effectiveness. If you notice long periods of time with no target, for example, your profile might be poorly written or you may be resting excessively. If, on the other hand, your target's health crosses zero several times per minute, your character is likely doing very well.

Each tick on the chart represents one minute (each pixel represents one second). The chart is updated once per second, regardless of your Status Refresh Interval setting. The chart automatically scrolls as needed from left to right. About two hours worth of data is stored at the most.
